title: Introduction to Martingales
abstract:
This paper introduces Martingales by covering introductory measure theory
concepts and the Lebesgue Integration and Conditional Expectation. It follows
up with proofs of Kolomorgov's Theorem on conditional expectations, the
Martingale Property, and the Pythagorean Theorem on Martingales. Finally, it
ends with Martingales' applications in finance.
